text.en: This machine, created to lead charges into enemy territory, mows down enemies by rushing.
text.de: Diese Maschine, erschaffen, um Angriffe in feindliches Gebiet zu führen, mäht die Feinde durch ihr Vorwärtsstürzen einfach nieder.
text.es: Esta máquina, creada para dirigir ataques en el territorio enemigo, se abalanza y barre a sus enemigos.
text.fr: Cette machine infernale a été conçue pour mener les attaques en territoire ennemi et charge furieusement pour faucher tous ses opposants.
text.it: Una macchina creata per condurre cariche in territorio nemico. Abbatte i suoi nemici muovendosi ad alta velocità.
text.ja: 特攻用に作り出した機械。突撃で敵をなぎ倒していく。
text.ko: 특공용으로 만들어 낸 기계. 돌격하여 적을 차례대로 쓰러뜨려 나아간다.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Hyperspeed Rush Road!!
Strongest Battle Deck Yuhi - Join and Explode! Join and Intensify!

ko.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Hyperspeed Rush Road!!
Strongest Battle Deck Yuhi - Join and Explode! Join and Intensify!
